extension.description: @realvito[CR]Musik aus verschiedenen Quellen z.B. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. auswählen und über Youtube abspielen.[CR][CR]Für mehr Informationen zu allen Neuerungen siehe - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT

@realvito[CR]Choose Music from different sources e.g. Billboard, iTunes, Spotify etc. and play it via Youtube.[CR][CR]For more information about all new features see - CHANGELOG.[CR] TEST IT AND LIKE IT
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Anbietern des Inhalts.
The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content providers.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: [B][COLOR orangered]Version 2.0.6 (12.08.2017)[/COLOR][/B] by realvito[CR] - changed: Beatport - show Subgenres and Title-ReleaseDates - fixed: Billboard - not showing "New in the last 24 hours" - fixed: Billboard - text errors in "Billboard-Archive-Videos" - fixed: Hypem - show HIDDEN Video-Images (not the colored ones) - removed: complete Spotify-Search (because a diffcult LOGIN is required since 29.05.17 and their policies don't allow the distribution of specialcodes) - added: Deezer-Search for: Artists, Songs, Albums, Playlists, User + Settings for: Deezer-Search (not as good as Spotify, but interesting)

addon.name: TV Spielfilm - Das Beste aus den Mediatheken

extension.description: @realvito[CR]The best from german Mediatheken, selected and compiled by the magazine TV-Spielfilm (www.tvspielfilm.de).[CR][CR]For more information about all new features see - CHANGELOG.[CR] HAVE FUN
